entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 6:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 2.5°C
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
